description: Details of enclosure of roof terraces to third and 18th floors (detailed drawings at 1:20, plus scaled axonometrics and specifications); the appearance of new plant enclosures or, where not enclosed, the plant itself (detailed drawings at 1:20 and specifications); new external windows and doors (detailed elevations and sections at 1:10); typical bay-studies of the altered external facades to street-facing podium elevations (detailed drawings at 1:20 and specifications) and extent of external stone replacement (overall elevations plus detailed elevations, plans and sections at 1:50, supported by a detailed photographic and written condition survey and method statements) pursuant to Condition 32 (B,C,D,E and F) of planning permission dated 08 April 2024 (RN23/00571/FULL).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
